name: Caorda Web Solutions
description:
Caorda Web Solutions is a Victoria based website design, hosting, digital marketing and software application development agency. Caorda is unique as we are a one-stop-shop for graphic design, branding, digital marketing, SEO, SEM (Google AdWords), software development and true Canadian business-level web hosting.
We’ve been told by our clients that Caorda is the perfect sized web development company and they feel valued and trust us to manage the hosting, security, and development of their online businesses.
We are experienced with a proven track record across several disciplines. We are large enough to have the in-house expertise to deliver complex web and mobile solutions, yet we are still small enough to make every client feel like they are number one.
Our core CMS development covers Wordpress, Drupal & Umbraco coupled with complete software development for desktop and mobile applications in .NET & PHP.
Caorda provides full end-to-end services, which includes project management, requirements analysis, digital marketing, design, development, and testing, right through to ongoing web hosting and support. Our delivery and engagement process ensures our clients receive the highest level of quality and service.
